txt.en: Directed archers in the defence of Harwick ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
The archers can hit your target
The archers of Harwick can focus their fire if you present them with a target.

'We are low on supplies and weapons, but that does not mean we cannot fight back. Even without swords, a soldier can still strike at the enemy from afar with a good bow and a stack of arrows. That is presuming he has a target to focus on. That is where you come in, [placeholder].\n\n'When you are near the Easterlings, raise this flag and the archers from Harwick will fire over the wall and strike any enemies around you. Direct them, and we shall win this battle.'
Direct archers with your flag while defending Harwick.\n\nWulfin has given you a flag you can use to direct the archers defending Harwick.
'The Easterlings are skilled in combat, but nothing bests a Rohirrim.'
'Are you prepared to join the battle and defend this town?'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This is an instanced public questing area.</rgb>
Direct archers in the defence of Harwick ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
<rgb=#FF0000>Completing Aiding the Eastemnet will cancel this quest</rgb>
Defence of Harwick: Rain of Arrows
